thread.title: Ideye Hails Eaglets; Happy With Olympiacos Goal
thread.title_full: Ideye Hails Eaglets; Happy With Olympiacos Goal

author: Nnamdi Ezekute
title: Ideye Hails Eaglets; Happy With Olympiacos Goal
text:
2015 FIFA U17 World Cup / Ideye Hails Eaglets; Happy With Olympiacos Goal Ideye Hails Eaglets; Happy With Olympiacos Goal 2015 FIFA U17 World Cup , Headlines 
By Bamidele Boluwaji: 
Super Eagles striker Brown Ideye is excited following the National U-17 Golden Eaglets performance against Chile at the ongoing FIFA U-17 World Cup in Chile, describing the Coach Emmanuel Amuneke’s boys as a bunch of talents, Completesportsnigeria.com reports. 
Nigeria defeated the host country 5-1 in their second Group A game of the tournament with both Samuel Chukwueze and Victor Osimhen scoring two goals each while the team captain, Kelechi Nwakali scored one in the routing of the bemused hosts. 
Reacting to the massive win, the Olympiacos of Greece forward said on his Twitter handle: “Watching Nigeria vs Chile game, this boys are talented, Nigeria is blessed”. 
Also reacting to his team’s performance in their UEFA Champions League game against Dinamo Zagreb, Ideye who scored the lone goal that earned his Greek club the maximum points with a late effort, described the win as a massive one. 
“Massive win tonight.#wekeepondreaming, #greatteamwork#olympiacosGreatGode#Thankful,” Ideye wrote on his Twitter handle. 
Olympiacos are second on the group F table with six points from three games while Bayern Munich top the group with same points and goal difference advantage.
